column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The crust was crunchy
column4: and a little bit mealy.  (This was the butter crust
column5: ordered "just right").  It also tasted somewhat of baking soda--it had that off
column6: objectionable taste I get when I try
column8: to make homemade dough.  Despite the fact that we ordered extra sauce
column9: what we got was basically nothing (and I'm not suggesting they forgot).  It tasted of nothing but stewed tomatoes--no flavor or seasoning almost at all!  The cheese was good
column10: although there was too much of it in relation to the sauce.
